ud1.9:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā gayāyaṁ viharati gayāsīse.
ud1.9:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā jaṭilā sītāsu hemantikāsu rattīsu antaraṭṭhake himapātasamaye gayāyaṁ ummujjantipi nimujjantipi,
ud1.9:2.1_0: Addasā kho bhagavā te sambahule jaṭile sītāsu hemantikāsu rattīsu antaraṭṭhake himapātasamaye gayāyaṁ
ud1.9:2.1_1: ummujjantepi nimujjantepi ummujjanimujjampi karonte osiñcantepi aggimpi juhante:
ud1.9:3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
